mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exhibit (exhibitNum, exhibitName, exhibitStart,exhibitEnd,host,supervise ,admitStart,admitEnd,genre,ratingNum,hallNum,exProfileImage) VALUES (exhibit_seq.NEXTVAL, #{exhibitName}, #{exhibitStart}, #{exhibitEnd}, #{host}, #{supervise}, #{admitStart}, #{admitEnd}, #{genre}, #{ratingNum}, #{hallNum},#{exProfileImage})
mapper.select: SELECT exhibitNum, exhibitName, exhibitStart, exhibitEnd,admitStart,admitEnd,genre, e.ratingNum, ratingName, e.hallNum, hallName, host,supervise, exProfileImage FROM exhibit e JOIN exhibitHall ex ON e.hallNum=ex.hallNum JOIN rating r ON e.ratingNum = r.ratingNum WHERE exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum}
SELECT audience||' '||exprice priceString FROM EXHIBITprice ep JOIN AUDIENCELEVEL al ON ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM = al.AUDIENCELEVELNUM WHERE ep.exhibitNum=#{exhibitNum} ORDER BY ep.AUDIENCELEVELNUM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exhibitPrice (audiencelevelnum, exhibitnum, exprice) values (#{audiencelevelnum},#{exhibitNum}.#{exprice})
